skills.name: Wield
skills.description: Quickly draws the sword to attack the enemy, decreasing the target's Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance. This skill has a 10% chance to activate the Sword of the Supreme Sky Wolf.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skills.name: Double Slash
skills.description: Swiftly attacks the enemy 2 times, leaving a Continuous Damage on the enemy for 2 turns on a Critical Hit. This skill has a 30% chance to activate the Sword of the Supreme Sky Wolf.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Flame Slash
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times with flaming sword energy. Each attack has a 40% chance to decrease the enemies' Attack Power for 2 turns. This skill has a 50% chance to activate the Sword of the Supreme Sky Wolf.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Sword of the Supreme Sky Wolf
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a secret skill that deals substantial damage that ignores all beneficial effects that reduces the inflicted damage. Generates a shield which is proportionate to your level and lasts for 1 turn if Sword of the Supreme Sky Wolf is activated.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage
